content:
We have ~300 open PRs (!?) now and most of them (~200) are S-waiting-on-review according to the rustc-pr-tracking: https://rust-lang.github.io/rustc-pr-tracking/
I know some members are on vacation but it'd be great if we could reduce the number as possible
well true but we hav emoved to a 15-day window for reviewers since people expressed they wanted more time for reviews. if you feel anything can be reassigned, feel free to do so
hm okay, I'll dig into a bit...
